attributes.action: introduce rules that AQA must follow when writing the ICT GCSE papers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 2007 ICT GCSE paper was appalling, as some questions were disambigiously worded, and others were much too easy. For example, a Question in the ICT paper displayed five database records and asked "How many records were present?"
